user.description:
Visit your Starling Home Hub interface, either on your app, or via the web, and look for "Starling Developer Connect" to create credentials.

This integration requires 2024 firmware using the /v2/ API.

data.url: URL Local de Ligação do Desenvolvedor

data_description.api_key: Ensure you have provided this the permissions required to perform all actions.
data_description.rtsp_username: Credentials need to be consistent across all cameras. If you do not require authorization for RTSP streaming then leave the fields blank.
data_description.enable_webrtc_stream: If both RTSP and WebRTC are enabled, WebRTC will be favored over RTSP where possible. If you have issues with WebRTC then enable RTSP streaming and disable WebRTC.

error.connection: Não foi possível ligar ao hub.
